nl_question: What proteins have the GO annotation 'nucleus' and are involved in the 'G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:ProteinHasGOAnnotation]->(go1:GO {displayName: 'nucleus'}), (p)-[:ProteinInPathway]->(pathway:Pathway {displayName: 'Signaling by GPCR'}) RETURN p.displayName AS ProteinName

nl_question: Are there any GO terms related to 'cellular anatomical structure' that are also subtypes of 'extracellular region'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (go1:GO {displayName: 'cellular anatomical structure'})<-[:GOIsSubtypeOfGO]-(go2:GO {displayName: 'extracellular region'}) RETURN go1 AS SubType, go2 AS Parent

nl_question: What is the relationship between the GO terms 'cytospinule' and 'actin-based cell projection' in the GO hierarchy?
cypher_translation: MATCH (go1:GO {displayName: 'ATP binding'})<-[:GOIsSubtypeOfGO]-(go2:GO {displayName: 'DNA binding'}) RETURN go1.displayName AS SubtypeName, go2.displayName AS ParentName

nl_question: Which proteins have the GO annotation 'nucleus' and are involved in the 'G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:ProteinHasGOAnnotation]->(go1:GO {displayName: 'nucleus'}), (p)-[:ProteinInPathway]->(pathway:Pathway {displayName: 'Signaling by GPCR'}) RETURN p.displayName AS ProteinName

nl_question: What are the descriptions and data sources associated with the GO term 'plasma membrane'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (go:GO {displayName: 'plasma membrane'}) RETURN go.description AS Description, go.dataSources AS DataSources

nl_question: Find all GO terms related to 'regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II' and their corresponding genes.
cypher_translation: MATCH (go1:GO {displayName: 'regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II'})<-[:ProteinHasGOAnnotation]-(p:Protein)-[:ProteinEncodedByGene]->(g:Gene) RETURN go1.displayName AS GOName, g.approvedSymbol AS GeneSymbol

nl_question: List all proteins annotated with the GO term 'metal ion binding' and their associated pathways.
cypher_translation: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:ProteinHasGOAnnotation]->(go1:GO {displayName: 'metal ion binding'}), (p)-[:ProteinInPathway]->(pathway:Pathway) RETURN p.displayName AS ProteinName, pathway.displayName AS PathwayName

nl_question: Can you provide the description for the GO term 'protein binding'?
List all GO terms that are a subtype of 'membrane'.
Which proteins are annotated with the GO term 'kinase activity'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:ProteinHasGOAnnotation]->(g:GO {displayName: 'kinase activity'}) RETURN p.displayName AS ProteinName

nl_question: What are the broader GO terms that 'cytoplasm' is a subtype of?
What are the synonyms for the GO term 'mitotic DNA replication initiation'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (g:GO {displayName: 'mitotic DNA replication initiation'}) RETURN g.synonyms

nl_question: What is the detailed description and any known synonyms for the Gene Ontology (GO) term 'protein binding'?
Can you identify all immediate sub-categories or subtypes of the Gene Ontology term 'signal transduction'?
Which proteins in the database are annotated with the Gene Ontology term 'membrane'?
For the GO term 'cytoplasm', what are its direct subtypes and from which data sources is information for these subtypes derived?
Provide a count of distinct proteins that are associated with the Gene Ontology term 'ATP binding'.
